name: Apples
description: Our apples are handpicked for their crispness, vibrant color, and sweet-tart flavor. Perfect for snacking, baking, or adding to salads, they offer a refreshing taste and are packed with essential vitamins and fiber for a healthy treat.

name: Bananas
description: Our bananas are naturally sweet, creamy, and rich in essential nutrients like potassium and fiber. Perfect for a quick snack, smoothies, or baking, they provide lasting energy and are a versatile addition to any meal.

name: Potatoes
description: Our potatoes are fresh, hearty, and versatile, perfect for roasting, mashing, or frying. Rich in essential nutrients like potassium and vitamin C, they offer a satisfying texture and flavor, making them a staple for any meal.

name: Onions
description: Our onions are fresh, flavorful, and versatile, ideal for enhancing the taste of any dish. Whether sautéed, caramelized, or raw, they add a rich, savory depth and are packed with vitamins and antioxidants to support a healthy diet.

name: Tomato
description: Fresh, juicy tomatoes, perfect for salads, sauces, and cooking. Rich in antioxidants and vitamins for a healthy boost.

name: Avocado
description: Creamy avocados, packed with heart-healthy fats and essential nutrients. Ideal for guacamole, salads, or as a toast topping.

name: Bell Pepper
description: Bright and crunchy bell peppers, great for stir-fries, salads, and stuffing. Full of vitamins and antioxidants.

name: Brinjal
description: Tender and versatile brinjals (eggplants), perfect for grilling, frying, or making traditional dishes like bharta.

name: Carrot
description: Crunchy and sweet carrots, ideal for snacking, salads, and cooking. A great source of beta-carotene and fiber.

name: Cherries
description: Juicy and sweet cherries, perfect for snacking or adding to desserts. Loaded with antioxidants and vitamins.

name: Coconut
description: Fresh coconut, ideal for extracting coconut water or adding rich coconut flavor to your dishes.

name: Coriander
description: Fresh and fragrant coriander, a must-have for garnishing and adding flavor to curries, salads, and chutneys.

name: Garlic
description: Pungent and flavorful garlic, perfect for seasoning and enhancing the taste of your dishes. Rich in antioxidants.

name: Ginger
description: Aromatic and spicy ginger, ideal for teas, curries, and stir-fries. Known for its anti-inflammatory and digestive benefits.

name: Grapes
description: Sweet and juicy grapes, perfect for snacking, adding to fruit salads, or making fresh juice. Rich in antioxidants.

name: Lemon
description: Zesty and tangy lemons, ideal for flavoring dishes, making refreshing drinks, or using as garnish. High in Vitamin C.

name: Mango
description: Sweet and succulent mangoes, perfect for desserts, smoothies, or enjoying on their own. A tropical delight rich in vitamins.

name: Mint
description: Fresh and cooling mint leaves, ideal for making chutneys, teas, or garnishing your favorite dishes.

name: Mushroom
description: Earthy and tender mushrooms, great for stir-fries, soups, and pizza toppings. A good source of protein and fiber.

name: Okra
description: Fresh and tender okra, perfect for frying, stir-fries, or making traditional dishes like bhindi masala.

name: Pumpkin
description: Sweet and versatile pumpkin, ideal for soups, curries, or baking. Packed with vitamins and fiber.

name: Spinach
description: Fresh and nutritious spinach, perfect for salads, curries, or smoothies. A powerhouse of iron and vitamins.

name: Tamarind
description: Tangy and flavorful tamarind, used in making chutneys, sauces, or adding a tangy twist to curries and beverages.

name: Watermelon
description: Juicy and refreshing watermelon, perfect for hydrating and snacking on a hot day. Packed with vitamins and antioxidants.

name: Orange
description: Sweet and tangy oranges, ideal for snacking or juicing. Rich in Vitamin C and antioxidants for a healthy boost.

name: Papaya
description: Ripe and sweet papaya, perfect for snacking or adding to salads and smoothies. Rich in digestive enzymes and vitamins.

name: Pea
description: Sweet and tender peas, perfect for curries, salads, or stir-fries. A great source of plant-based protein and fiber.

name: Salt
description: Our salt is pure, natural, and finely balanced to enhance the flavor of any dish. Essential for seasoning, it brings out the best in both sweet and savory recipes while providing essential minerals for everyday nutrition.

name: Sugar
description: Our sugar is pure, finely granulated, and perfect for adding a touch of sweetness to any recipe. Whether used in baking, beverages, or cooking, it dissolves easily and enhances the flavor of your favorite treats.

name: Flour
description: Our finely milled flour is perfect for all your baking and cooking needs, offering a smooth texture and consistent quality. Ideal for making bread, pastries, and more, it ensures a great result every time.

name: Rice
description: Our premium rice is carefully selected for its quality and texture, making it perfect for a variety of dishes. Whether for daily meals or special occasions, it cooks to fluffy perfection every time.

name: Almonds
description: Premium quality almonds, packed with healthy fats, fiber, protein, and essential vitamins. Perfect for snacking or adding to desserts.

name: Baking Powder
description: High-quality baking powder, ideal for making cakes, cookies, and other baked goods rise perfectly.

name: Baking Soda
description: Pure baking soda, essential for baking, cleaning, and other household uses. Provides a light texture to baked goods.

name: Barley
description: Nutritious and fiber-rich barley, perfect for making soups, salads, and adding to stews.

name: Bean
description: High-protein dried beans, perfect for making soups, stews, or serving as a side dish.

name: Besan (Chickpea Flour)
description: Fine, gluten-free chickpea flour, great for making pakoras, pancakes, or adding to gluten-free recipes.

name: Chickpea
description: Nutritious and versatile chickpeas, perfect for making hummus, curries, or salads.

name: Cocoa Powder
description: Rich and flavorful cocoa powder, ideal for baking, making hot chocolate, or adding to desserts.

name: Corn
description: Whole, dried corn kernels, perfect for popping or grinding into cornmeal for baking.

name: Cornstarch
description: Fine cornstarch, ideal for thickening soups, sauces, and gravies. A pantry essential for bakers and cooks alike.

name: Legumes
description: Healthy and protein-packed legumes, a great addition to soups, salads, and vegetarian dishes.

name: Lentils
description: Nutritious and versatile lentils, perfect for making soups, curries, and salads.

name: Macaroni
description: Durum wheat macaroni, ideal for making pasta dishes, salads, and soups. A pantry essential.

name: Maida (All-purpose Flour)
description: Refined all-purpose flour, perfect for baking, frying, and making a variety of delicious dishes.

name: Oats
description: Healthy and versatile oats, great for making oatmeal, granola, or adding to smoothies and baked goods.

name: Peanuts
description: Crunchy and nutritious peanuts, perfect for snacking, making peanut butter, or adding to recipes.

name: Semolina
description: Coarse semolina, ideal for making pasta, upma, or adding texture to baked goods.

name: Tapioca
description: Small, pearl-like tapioca, perfect for making puddings or adding texture to desserts and drinks.

name: Chicken
description: Our fresh, high-quality chicken is carefully sourced to ensure tenderness and rich flavor. Perfect for grilling, roasting, or frying, it's a versatile protein choice for any meal.

name: Fish
description: Our fresh, sustainably sourced fish offers a delicate flavor and firm texture, perfect for a variety of dishes. Ideal for grilling, baking, or frying, it’s a healthy and delicious choice for seafood lovers.

name: Shrimps
description: Our premium shrimps are sourced for their freshness and succulent taste, perfect for a variety of dishes. Whether grilled, sautéed, or added to your favorite recipes, they offer a rich, ocean-fresh flavor.

name: Mutton
description: Our high-quality mutton is tender and flavorful, perfect for slow-cooking, grilling, or curries. It provides a rich, hearty taste that elevates traditional and gourmet dishes alike.

name: Chicken Leg
description: Fresh, tender chicken legs perfect for grilling, roasting, or frying. A flavorful and protein-rich choice for any meal.

name: Crab
description: Freshly caught crabs, known for their sweet and succulent meat. Perfect for seafood lovers looking to prepare gourmet meals at home.

name: Lamb
description: Tender and premium-quality lamb, ideal for slow cooking, roasting, or grilling. A rich source of protein and iron.

name: Lobster
description: Fresh and succulent lobster, prized for its sweet and tender meat. Perfect for gourmet seafood dishes and special occasions.

name: Prawn
description: Delicious and juicy prawns, perfect for making curries, stir-fries, or grilled dishes. A seafood favorite with a mild, sweet flavor.

name: Red Meat
description: Premium quality red meat, known for its rich flavor and tenderness. Ideal for grilling, roasting, or making hearty stews.

name: Salami
description: Cured salami with rich and savory flavors, perfect for adding to sandwiches, pizzas, or charcuterie boards.

name: Sausage
description: Flavorful and juicy sausages, made with high-quality meat and spices. Ideal for grilling, breakfast dishes, or adding to casseroles.

name: Eggs
description: Our farm-fresh eggs are packed with nutrition and rich flavor, perfect for a variety of dishes. Ideal for breakfast, baking, or adding to meals, they offer freshness and quality in every bite.

name: Butter
description: Our rich, creamy butter is made from high-quality ingredients, offering a smooth texture and delicious taste. Perfect for spreading, baking, or cooking, it adds a delightful flavor to any dish.

name: Milk
description: Our fresh milk is rich and creamy, sourced from quality dairy farms to ensure a pure and wholesome taste. Perfect for drinking, cooking, or baking, it offers essential nutrients and a deliciously smooth flavor.

name: Cheese
description: Our premium cheese is crafted for exceptional flavor and texture, ideal for enhancing any meal. Whether enjoyed on its own, melted over dishes, or added to recipes, it brings a touch of gourmet quality to your table.

name: Almond Milk
description: A plant-based alternative to dairy milk, almond milk offers a nutty flavor with a smooth and creamy texture. Ideal for lactose-intolerant individuals or those seeking a healthy milk substitute.

name: Cheese Slice
description: Delicious cheese slices, perfect for adding to sandwiches, burgers, or melting over hot dishes. Made from quality milk to provide a rich, creamy flavor.

name: Condensed Milk
description: Sweetened condensed milk, perfect for making desserts, adding creaminess to beverages, or baking. A rich, indulgent treat.

name: Curd
description: Fresh and creamy curd, perfect for consuming with meals or using in cooking. Packed with probiotics for a healthy digestive system.

name: Flavoured Yogurt
description: Delicious flavored yogurt with a creamy texture and fruity taste. A healthy snack option loaded with probiotics and nutrients.

name: Ghee
description: Premium quality ghee, known for its rich aroma and flavor. Perfect for traditional cooking, baking, or adding to meals for enhanced taste.

name: Ice Cream
description: Rich and creamy ice cream in a variety of flavors. Perfect for a cool and sweet treat during any time of the day.

name: Milk Powder
description: Versatile milk powder for use in cooking, baking, or preparing beverages. Offers a long shelf life and retains the essential nutrients of fresh milk.

name: Paneer
description: Soft and fresh paneer, perfect for making delicious Indian dishes like paneer tikka, curries, and more. A great source of protein.

name: Nut Butter
description: Rich and creamy nut butter, made from high-quality peanuts for a smooth and indulgent spread. Ideal for toast, smoothies, or baking.

name: Soy Milk
description: A dairy-free alternative made from soybeans, soy milk is rich in protein and offers a smooth, slightly sweet flavor. Perfect for lactose-intolerant individuals.

name: Tofu
description: Protein-packed tofu, ideal for vegetarian and vegan meals. Soft and versatile, it can be used in stir-fries, soups, or salads.

name: Whipped Cream
description: Light and fluffy whipped cream, perfect for topping desserts, beverages, or using as a frosting. Adds a creamy and indulgent touch.

name: Yogurt
description: Creamy and refreshing plain yogurt, packed with probiotics for a healthy gut. Ideal for consuming as a snack or adding to dishes.

name: Bread
description: Our freshly baked bread offers a soft, fluffy texture with a delightful crust, perfect for sandwiches, toast, or as a side to any meal. Made with quality ingredients, it’s a staple that brings warmth and flavor to your table.

name: Buns
description: Our soft, freshly baked buns are light and fluffy, ideal for burgers, sandwiches, or as a delicious snack. Made with high-quality ingredients, they offer a perfect blend of taste and texture for any meal.

name: Cookies
description: Our delectable cookies are baked to perfection with a rich, buttery flavor and a delightful crunch. Made with high-quality ingredients, they’re perfect for a sweet treat or as a snack anytime.

name: Bagel
description: Our bagels are soft, chewy, and baked to perfection. Enjoy them toasted with your favorite spreads, or use them for sandwiches to add a delightful texture and flavor to your meal.

name: Banana Chips
description: Crispy and slightly sweet, our banana chips make for a tasty and healthy snack. Perfect for munching on the go, they are packed with fiber and natural goodness.

name: Croissant
description: Our croissants are buttery, flaky, and golden brown, delivering a perfect balance of crispness and softness. Ideal for breakfast or an afternoon snack.

name: Dark Chocolate
description: Indulge in the rich and intense flavor of our dark chocolate. Made from high-quality cocoa, it offers a perfect balance of bitterness and sweetness.

name: Donut
description: Soft, fluffy, and coated with a sugary glaze, our donuts are the perfect treat to satisfy your sweet tooth. Enjoy them as a quick snack or dessert.

name: Nachos
description: Crispy and crunchy, our nachos are perfect for dipping in salsa or guacamole. Enjoy them as a snack or as part of your favorite Mexican-inspired meal.

name: Pav
description: Our pav buns are soft and fluffy, ideal for serving with curries or as a base for pav bhaji. Enjoy the fresh, homemade taste with every bite.

name: Popcorn Box
description: Our popcorn is light, crunchy, and perfect for movie nights or anytime snacking. Enjoy it with your favorite seasonings or plain for a healthy treat.

name: Rusk
description: Our rusks are crisp and crunchy, perfect for dipping in tea or coffee. Enjoy the delightful flavor of this classic snack, made with high-quality ingredients.

name: Wafer
description: Light and crispy, our wafers are perfect for a quick snack or dessert. Available in various flavors, they offer a delightful crunch in every bite.

name: Star Anise
description: Our premium star anise adds a unique, aromatic flavor to your dishes, perfect for enhancing both sweet and savory recipes. Its distinct, licorice-like taste brings an exotic touch to your culinary creations.

name: Cloves
description: Our high-quality cloves offer a warm, spicy flavor with a hint of sweetness, ideal for seasoning both sweet and savory dishes. Perfect for adding depth and richness to your culinary creations.

name: Sunflower Oil
description: Our pure sunflower oil is light and neutral, perfect for cooking, baking, and frying. With a high smoke point and subtle flavor, it enhances your dishes without overpowering them.

name: Bay Leaves
description: Our dried bay leaves are aromatic and perfect for infusing flavor into soups, stews, and sauces. Add a rich depth of taste with these high-quality leaves.

name: Ajwain
description: Ajwain, or carom seeds, add a unique and slightly bitter flavor to Indian dishes. Perfect for tempering or enhancing flavor in breads and curries.

name: Black Pepper
description: Our premium whole black peppercorns offer a bold and pungent flavor. Perfect for seasoning a variety of dishes, from soups to marinades.

name: Cardamom
description: Our fresh green cardamom pods bring a sweet and aromatic flavor to both sweet and savory dishes. Perfect for Indian desserts, curries, and beverages.

name: Chilli Powder
description: Our fiery red chilli powder adds heat and vibrant color to your dishes. Ideal for spicing up curries, marinades, and snacks.

name: Cinnamon
description: Our premium cinnamon sticks offer a warm, sweet aroma and taste, perfect for adding depth to desserts, beverages, and savory dishes.

name: Coconut Oil
description: Our cold-pressed coconut oil is perfect for cooking, baking, and skin care. Rich in flavor and nutrition, it's a versatile staple for any household.

name: Coriander Powder
description: Our finely ground coriander powder adds a mild, earthy flavor to curries, soups, and stir-fries. Essential for any Indian kitchen.

name: Cumin
description: Our whole cumin seeds bring a nutty, peppery flavor to your dishes. Perfect for tempering or grinding for use in various cuisines.

name: Curry Leaves
description: Fresh curry leaves add a fragrant, citrusy flavor to Indian dishes. Use them to temper dals, curries, and stir-fries for authentic taste.

name: Fenugreek
description: Our fenugreek seeds offer a slightly bitter, nutty flavor. Perfect for tempering or sprouting for use in curries, chutneys, and pickles.

name: Mustard Oil
description: Our cold-pressed mustard oil adds a strong, pungent flavor to pickles and Indian dishes. Known for its health benefits, it’s a must-have in traditional Indian cooking.

name: Olive Oil
description: Our extra virgin olive oil is perfect for drizzling, dipping, and dressing. Cold-pressed for a fresh, fruity flavor, it's great for salads and Mediterranean dishes.

name: Sesame Seeds
description: Our sesame seeds offer a rich, nutty flavor and are perfect for adding to breads, stir-fries, and snacks. Packed with nutrients, they’re a healthy addition to any meal.

name: Turmeric
description: Our vibrant turmeric powder brings a warm, earthy flavor and a rich yellow color to your dishes. Packed with health benefits, it’s a staple in Indian cooking.

name: Ketchup
description: Our rich and tangy ketchup is crafted with premium tomatoes and spices, perfect for adding a burst of flavor to burgers, fries, and more. It’s a versatile condiment that complements a wide range of dishes.

name: Oregano
description: Our premium oregano adds a robust, aromatic flavor to your dishes, perfect for seasoning pizzas, pasta, and Mediterranean recipes. Its fresh, herbal notes enhance the taste of both savory and grilled dishes.

name: Caramel Syrup
description: Our rich and velvety caramel syrup is perfect for drizzling over desserts, pancakes, or ice cream. Made with quality ingredients, it adds a delightful sweetness to your favorite treats.

name: Chilli Oil
description: Our spicy chilli oil is infused with aromatic spices, making it perfect for drizzling over pizzas, pastas, or stir-fry dishes. Add a kick of flavor to your meals!

name: Chilli Sauce
description: Our fiery chilli sauce is a blend of ripe red chillies and spices, perfect for dipping or adding heat to your dishes. Great for Asian cuisine, BBQs, and more.

name: Chocolate Spread
description: Our delicious chocolate spread is rich, creamy, and perfect for spreading on toast, pancakes, or enjoying straight from the jar. A delightful treat for chocolate lovers!

name: Ginger Garlic Paste
description: Our ginger garlic paste is a flavorful blend of fresh ginger and garlic, perfect for marinating meats or adding depth to your curries and stir-fries.

name: Honey
description: Our pure honey is sourced from the finest hives, offering a natural sweetness perfect for teas, baking, or drizzling over pancakes and desserts.

name: Jams
description: Our homemade jams are crafted with fresh fruits and sugar, perfect for spreading on toast or adding to desserts for a burst of fruity flavor.

name: Mayonnaise
description: Our creamy mayonnaise is perfect for sandwiches, salads, and dips. Made with quality ingredients, it adds richness and flavor to your favorite dishes.

name: Mustard Sauce
description: Our tangy mustard sauce is perfect for adding a zesty kick to sandwiches, burgers, and dressings. A classic condiment that complements a variety of dishes.

name: Paprika
description: Our vibrant paprika adds color and a sweet, smoky flavor to your dishes. Perfect for seasoning meats, stews, and rice dishes.

name: Pasta Sauce
description: Our rich pasta sauce is made with ripe tomatoes and a blend of herbs, perfect for tossing with your favorite pasta or using as a pizza base.

name: Peanut Butter
description: Our creamy peanut butter is made from premium peanuts, perfect for spreading on toast or adding to smoothies and baked goods for extra flavor and nutrition.

name: Salsa Dip
description: Our fresh salsa dip is made with ripe tomatoes and spices, perfect for pairing with chips, tacos, or as a topping for grilled meats.

name: Schezwan Sauce
description: Our spicy schezwan sauce is perfect for adding heat to your stir-fries, noodles, or as a dipping sauce. A must-have for lovers of bold flavors!

name: Soy Sauce
description: Our premium soy sauce is perfect for marinating, stir-frying, or as a condiment for Asian dishes. Adds a rich umami flavor to your meals.

name: Vinegar
description: Our distilled vinegar is perfect for pickling, marinades, and salad dressings. A versatile ingredient that enhances flavor in a variety of dishes.

name: Green Tea
description: Our high-quality tea leaves offer a rich, aromatic flavor with every brew, perfect for a refreshing cup of tea. Carefully sourced and expertly processed, they provide a delightful and invigorating experience in every sip.

name: Buttermilk
description: Our refreshing buttermilk is a perfect blend of yogurt and spices, ideal for cooling off on hot days. Rich in probiotics, it’s a healthy choice for any meal.

name: Tea
description: Our high-quality tea leaves offer a rich, aromatic flavor with every brew, perfect for a refreshing cup of tea. Carefully sourced and expertly processed, they provide a delightful and invigorating experience in every sip.

name: Vanilla Drink
description: Our creamy vanilla drink is a delightful blend of rich vanilla flavor, perfect for enjoying chilled or as an ingredient in desserts. A sweet treat for any time of day!

name: Soda
description: Our refreshing soda offers a fizzy burst of flavor, perfect for quenching your thirst. Enjoy it on its own or as a mixer for your favorite cocktails.

name: Orange Juice
description: Our fresh orange juice is squeezed from the finest oranges, providing a burst of citrus flavor and essential vitamins. Perfect for breakfast or a refreshing snack.

name: Iced Tea
description: Our chilled iced tea is brewed from premium tea leaves and infused with refreshing flavors. Perfect for hot days, it’s a delicious and revitalizing beverage.

name: Coffee Beans
description: Our premium coffee beans are carefully selected for their rich flavor and aroma, perfect for brewing a fresh cup of coffee. A must-have for any coffee lover!

name: Coconut Water
description: Our natural coconut water is a refreshing drink packed with electrolytes, perfect for hydration. Enjoy it chilled for a tropical taste experience.

name: Cider
description: Our crisp cider is made from the finest apples, offering a refreshing, fruity flavor. Perfect for enjoying on its own or as a mixer.

name: Beer
description: Our premium beer is brewed using traditional methods for a crisp, refreshing taste. Perfect for gatherings or relaxing after a long day.

name: Wine
description: Our exquisite wine is carefully crafted from the finest grapes, offering a rich flavor profile perfect for pairing with meals or enjoying on its own.
